rationale: The PDDI-CDS IG focuses on improving drug-drug interaction alerts within EHR workflows during medication ordering, using FHIR, CDS Hooks, and CQL. This firmly places it within Clinical Care, specifically Medication Management, with a reliance on FHIR R4. The scope is primarily Workflow Support and Data Exchange, targeting a US Realm audience (implied by HIPAA compliance) and relying on EHR-centric data. Its status as an implementation guide indicates a Draft/Trial Use maturity level.
